title: 162: Scouting Combine preview, talking to Myles Garrett’s high school coach
itunes:title: 162: Scouting Combine preview, talking to Myles Garrett’s high school coach
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks head to Indianapolis for the 2017 Scouting Combine. In this episode, the duo will preview what to look for from the offensive players who will work out first at the Combine. They break down the best quarterbacks, running backs, wide receivers and offensive linemen in the class. DJ and Bucky also talk to Texas A&M defensive lineman Myles Garrett’s high school football coach Bob Wager.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
